All Implemented Interfaces:
PrivateKeyService
public class DBPrivateKeyService
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrivateKeyService

PrivateKeyService that uses a database to locate private keys for local ids.

setCacheSize

public void setCacheSize(int cache_size)
By default we keep a "least recently used" cache of PrivateKeys. The default size is 100.

Parameters:
cache_size - The new cache size. Values <= 0 will turn off caching.
